content: STI ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Mar 2019Does STI ETF pays dividend every year if I were to buy using RSP or are the dividends reinvested automatically every year? 2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Short answer, yes. The dividends are paid twice a year, normally in Jan/Feb and Jul/Aug.And no, the dividends is not automatically reinvested.0 comments0

Han Jinyuan Larry, Senior Lifeguard at CertisLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Yes, STI ETF payout Dividend yearly to the same bank account that deducts monthly for Regular Saving Plan.0 comments0
